f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:40): I've been asked to write an article for a popular online magazine, called "Developing with HTML5" (somewhat based on the presentation I did in August)...
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:40): I'm trying to decide which topics to discuss.
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:41): So far, I've written about choosing HTML or XHTML and using both together, and about the sectioning elements and heading algorithm
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:41): I want to include one more topic and would like some feedback about what to choose:
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:42): 1. new semantics: time/meter/progress
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:42): 2. Embedded content and multimedia (video, audio and canvas)
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (13:42): 3. Form controls
